meanings.definition: Designed to be practical and useful rather than attractive.
meanings.sent1: The simple and functional design of the tool made it easy to use.
meanings.sent2: The functional kitchen utensils were easy to clean and store.
meanings.sent3: The functional backpack may not be stylish, but it can hold all your belongings.
meanings.sent4: Her functional approach to problem-solving was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The functional layout of the office maximized efficiency and productivity.

meanings.sent1: The car's engine was not just functional but also reliable.
meanings.sent2: After the repairs, the printer was finally functional again.
meanings.sent3: The functional alarm clock ensured he woke up on time every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her functional laptop never let her down during important presentations.
meanings.sent5: The functional air conditioner kept the room cool even on hot summer days.

meanings.definition: Able to operate or be used.
meanings.sent1: The new software was functional on all devices.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight was functional despite being dropped multiple times.
meanings.sent3: The functional remote control made it easy to switch channels.
meanings.sent4: His functional knowledge of the machine helped him fix it quickly.
meanings.sent5: The functional bicycle allowed her to commute to work efficiently.
